amendment.description: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Menendez amendment, directing the President to withhold from assistance made available with funds appropriated in the bill an amount equal to the sum of assistance and credits provided to the government of a country that, on or after the date of the enactment of the bill, is used by that country, or any entity in that country, in support of the completion of the nuclear facility at Juragua, Cuba.

action.text: Substitute (A022) offered by Mr. Wilson to the Menendez amendment (A021).

Mr. Menendez raised a point of order against the Wilson amendment (A022). Mr. Menendez stated that the substitute amendment is outside the scope of the rule under which the bill is being considered. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
By unanimous consent, the Wilson amendment was withdrawn.
